H0.text: What language was first to be represented in dictionaries and related language theory. Sumerian

H1.text: What language was first to be represented in dictionaries and related language theory. Ancient Greek

H2.text: What language was first to be represented in dictionaries and related language theory. Latin

H3.text: What language was first to be represented in dictionaries and related language theory. Chineſe

A4.text: His pioneering Contribution au Dictionnaire sumérien–assyrien, Paris 1905–1907, turns out to provide the foundation for P. Anton Deimel's 1934 Sumerisch-Akkadisches Glossar

A5.text: Friedrich Delitzsch published a learned Sumerian dictionary and grammar in the form of his Sumerisches Glossar and Grundzüge der sumerischen Grammatik, both appearing in 1914
